tr.td: Having health care tasks take too much time
Having to go to the bathroom often

div.p: Expansion based on codesystem Care Trade-off Concepts v0.1.0 (CodeSystem)

tr.td: Checking health signs (e.g., weight, blood pressure)
Going through other Diagnostic Tests (e.g. mammography)
Visiting counselor (e.g., psychologist, social worker, therapist)
Doing rehabilitation (e.g., physical therapy, cardio rehabilitation)

div.p: Expansion based on codesystem PPC What Matters Concepts v0.1.0 (CodeSystem)

tr.td: Doing activities with family and friends
Walking or moving inside and outside of my home
Taking care of family and friends and/or pets in my life
Comfort and function are more important than living longer
Activities that support my religious or spiritual life
Living as long as possible even if I am unable to do the things that are most important to me
Doing productive work (e.g. a job or volunteering)
Living as long as possible, even if that means more treatments, pain, or discomfort
Reducing the amount of time I devote to health care
Avoiding spending time in the hospital
